local_intent: Detect the T-block, approach and align to it within 1 cm, then verify proximity/alignment before subsequent yaw-setting and push.
assumptions: IsAt(target=t_block) is a sufficient verification of alignment for this phase
coherence_with_global: Matches the initial alignment step of the GLOBAL_BT (detect then ApproachAndAlign) and prepares for the following SetTCPYaw and push; detection is retried up to 3 times as in the global policy.
